subject: Education
title: Digital Formative Tools: Real-Time Data at Scale
description: A quick, practical guide to Digital Formative Tools: Real-Time Data at Scale.

hook.text: Every student answers on their phone. The teacher sees a live bar chart of who gets it and who doesn't.

buildup.text: Tools like Kahoot, Plickers, and Mentimeter turn every classroom into a live data dashboard.

discovery.text: Real-time response data lets teachers pivot instruction in the moment, not after the unit test.

climax.text: The best digital tools balance engagement with reflection, adding 'explain your answer' prompts.

punchline.text: Technology makes every student's thinking visible at once.

quiz.question: What is a risk of gamified digital formative assessment tools?
